content.rendered:
Directed by Pushpendra Nath Misra

Written by Pushpendra Nath Misra

Cast Nawazuddin Siddiqui (Ghoomketu). Ragini Khanna (JankiDevi). Richa Chadha (Pagaliya (as Richa Chadda)). Anurag Kashyap (Inspector Badlani). Deepika Amin (Mrs. Badlani. Inspector’s Wife). Raghuvir Yadav (Dadda). Ila Arun (Santo Bua). Swanand Kirkire (Guddan Chacha). Nikkhil Advani (Self). Frank M. Ahearn (Lolly). Amitabh Bachchan (Amitabh Bachchan). Azzy Bagria (Friend (as Bagria Azzy)). Debanjan Chatterjee (Director). Jayant Gadekar (Inspector Shinde). Mahesh Ginnilaal (Waiter 1 (as Mahesh Ginnilal)). Lauren Gottlieb (Self). Harsh Gupta (Baanke Bihari Grandson). Brijendra Kala (Mr. Ramakant Joshi). Deepak Kalra (Judge). Varun Kulkarni (Assistant Director). R.C. Pathak (Brother in law (as Rc Pathak)). Huma Qureshi (Self). Satya Ranjan (Paagal). Ritu Sharma (Teacher). Chitrangda Singh (Self). Ranveer Singh (Self). Sonakshi Sinha (Self)

Languages Hindi

Producers Sankalp Acharekar. Vivek b Agrawal. Vikas Bahl. Anupama Bose. Vakshi Gosain. Anurag Kashyap. Pranjal Khandhdiya. Pooja Krishnamoorthy. Vikramaditya Motwane. Ranjan Singh. Ravi Tiwari.

Production Multi Screen Multimedia. Phantom Films
